title: Security Challenge: Hack Vault
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Fork Repository: 
https://github.com/OpenSpace100/openspace_ctf

Read the code in `Vault.sol` and the test cases. Add some code to the `testExploit` function in the test cases to try to withdraw all the funds from the pre-deployed Vault contract. 
So that running `forge test` can pass all the tests. 

You can add code in `Vault.t.sol` or add a new contract, but do not modify the existing code. 

Please submit the link to your forked repository.

description: This challenge examines reentrancy attacks, ABI encoding, and understanding of delegatecall.
